It is a website based on different machine learning models
Different Machine learning models are implemented in it

patterns: What kinds of machine learning models are there?
What machine learning models are used?
responses: We used CNN for mask detection, SEQ2SEQ model for chatbot and Image Processing Model in out Text to image Converter

patterns: explain the basic idea of machine learning.
responses: Machine Learning (ML) is the science of automating a task using some autonomous bots created by several programming languages
Machine learning is the study of computer algorithms that can improve automatically through experience and by the use of data. It is seen as a part of artificial intelligence.

patterns: what are you making for this project
responses: We have a facemask detector with AI chatbot adding to this we have Image-to-text converter
our project covers three main ML and ReactJS based applications -The Facemask Detector -AI ChatBot -Image-to-text Converter

patterns: What are the different languages used for the facemask Detector
What are the different platforms used in the Facemask detector
responses: We are using python, TensorFlow, OpenCV, Keras, and Transfer Learning
For Facemask Detector we have Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV, Keras, and Transfer Learning

patterns: What are the different languages used for the AI chatbot
What are the different platforms used in the AI chatbot
responses: We are using python, TensorFlow and Kesar
For AI chatbot we have Python, TensorFlow and Kesar

patterns: What are the different languages used for the Image-to-Text Converter
What are the different platforms used in the Image-to text Converter
responses: We are using OpenCV, TensorFlow and Kesar
For AI chatbot we have OpenCV, TensorFlow, and Kesar

patterns: What are the applications using Python
what are the two applications using Python
responses: The Facemask Detector and AI chatbot are using python

patterns: What are the applications using Kesar
What are the applications using TensorFlow
What are the applications using Kesar and TensorFlow
What are the applications using both Kesar and TensorFlow
responses: All three applications i.e. Facemask Detector, AI chatbot, and Image-to text Converter are using both Kesar and TensorFlow

responses: Both  FaceMask detector and Image-to-Text converter are using openCV

Our hours are 9am-9pm every day
React. js/React is an open-source front-end framework that is based on JavaScript, developed by Facebook, and best known for its virtual DOM feature
The Document Object Model (DOM) is a programming API for HTML and XML documents. It defines the logical structure of documents and the way a document is accessed and manipulated.

patterns: who is the creator of this website?
responses: This Website is created by Varun Sharma, Divyanshu Sharma, and Samay Gandotra. For more info click on about section
